title: Sloth

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Visit a player, doing nothing but looking for death. If they would be attacked, you take the attack instead.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- When you would die at night, you instead Relax. Everyone who would die that night has their death delayed until the start of the next day.
- Players whose deaths are delayed are informed of it. The town is also aware the Sloth is relaxing.
- If a player with a delayed death is hanged, they immediately revive in front of the town and their delayed death is stopped. Their role is not revealed. The Sloth can also cheat death in this way.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Have each living Peasant fulfill their Destiny.

desc:
Post 4360
*It was the sixth night after the witch-hunt started. Twelve dead by the third night. Nothing had happened for the last three. Where was all the action, the excitement? In the face of death, the only thing more worrisome than seeing the reaper was not seeing him at all.*
